tha-ap397:3.2: araññe → vipine (bj); irine (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); iriṇe (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap397:13.4: gāthā pabyāharī → gāthā'mā vyāharī (bj); gāthā sabyāharī (sya1ed, sya2ed); gāthā mavyāhārī (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap397:16.3: mahantassa → brahaṃ tassa (bj); brahantassa (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap397:23.1: caratā → caraṇā (si, pts-vp-pli1, mr); carite (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap397:27.1: Idha passāmi → idhaddasāsiṃ (bj); tamaddasāmi (sya1ed, sya2ed); tamaddassāsiṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
